body.name: Lepro LED Camping Lanterns Battery Powered, Collapsible, IPX4 Water Resistant, Outdoor Portable Lights for Emergency, Hurricane, Storms and Outages
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 46 mins
features: Sufficient Brightness: With a 360-degree beam angle and long lighting time, this lantern gives out sufficient light (190 lumen) to illuminate tent or room.

Lightweight and Portable: The lamp is lightweight and small when being folded, you can easily store it in your cabin, backpack or survival kit, ideal for outdoor activities or using as an emergency light.
Easy to use: Pull or push to swith on/off the latern . Collapsible design easily adjust brightness to meet your need ,conveniently fold it up for easy storage.
Water Resistant: Good for outdoor activities in light rain or snowy day. IPX4 rating means this lantern is protected against splashing water from all angle.
Battery Powered: Each lantern is powered by 3pcs AA batteries (not included), so you can use it when power fails. No need to wait for a few hours’ charging, saving time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PORTABLE, SAFE & EASY TO USE Designed for portability and safety. The lantern collapses easily with a simple push, making it perfect for camping trips or travel. ABSOLUTELY NO OIL, FIRE, OR DANGER. Carry it anywhere you need a handy, bright light. The advanced collapsible design streamlines both usage and transportation. Wattage: 3W Lumens: 190LM Discharge Time: 14 hrs Water Resistance: IPX4 Weight: 900g Battery Requirement: 3 AA (Each)

Stretch and Collapse No buttons required. This lantern simplifies operation—just stretch to turn on and collapse to turn off. Bright and Reliable Armed with advanced 2835 LED technology, this camping lantern provides up to 190 lumens of super-bright light, powered by 3 AA batteries. It can easily illuminate an entire tent. Versatile Applications Ideal for a range of outdoor activities including fishing, working, hiking, camping, hunting, exploring, searching, and car repairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these lanterns because of a possible predicted storm and the concern I had that power might be lost. It never happened, but these lanterns would have handled a power outage very well. They are very bright, light-weight, and there are four of them in the package. They require 4 double AA batteries which are easy to install If and when we might lose power. Also, the box is small and easily stored.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and reliable
reviews.reviewText: These lanterns are smaller than they appear in the pictures but they do pack a lot of light into a small package! I bought four (4) of these for my parents who are in their 80s so they could have one right nearby every spot they sit or work in - never more than an arm's reach away. They're easy to use for my elder parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and compact
reviews.reviewText: Works great for intending car camping purposes. Doesn't drain batteries quickly which is nice as well. Not sure about durability of electronics and wiring, but housing is robust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 4 of these after we lost power for a couple of days. Never thought I’d need them for a while. Well, 2 weeks later we lost power again. These worked better than expected. You Can adjust the amount of light. At fully open it lit up the area we were in really well. I had given 2 to my mom She had lost power too and she loved them. Used one again recently to go into the attic , where there’s minimal light. Compact size with so much light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product Good, Lighting is OK.
reviews.reviewText: Product met need & great price, however would have hoped for stronger light output, especially with the Duracell PLUS Batteries I installed. Light is OK, but if you're really looking to 'light up' an area, look further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids emergency
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for grandkids emergency light. Worked perfectly and easy to use. Lights went out and they were able to access easily and pulled up for bright light to shine. Used until lights came back on. Also saved 1 for myself and leave it in accessible area in case of emergency. Recommend to friends to purchase for camping and emergency lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lights give off just the perfect amount of light. I like the fact that you can adjust the amount of light you want. They are durable and compact. I would highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: Listen...I originally wanted a different lantern but geez it was expensive. So I got shopping around and found these. I bought these 4 for the price of the single ones I wanted, so screw it and I bought them. Also they take 3 AA batteries and not a ridiculous amount of D bates. So that was a big buying point for me. The day I got them, I opened the box and expected them to be bigger than they are. I actually like their size. They can even go in the car, etc. I bought them for when the power goes out at our house because we live in the boonies. They are BRIGHT. Like don't look at it if you want to keep your retinas. I think they're awesome for the price!
Needs a lot of batteries but work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: I’m ready for any electricity power cuts this winter
reviews.reviewText: I’m all set up for any blackouts when the electric goes off. They are well made and also look good and can be hung up in any room.I’ve also bought some for my friend who is a pensioner.

My power went out a few nights ago, so I had a chance to use these. I LOVE them. So very lightweight they can be hung anywhere, or placed to stand flat on a flat surface. Four for under 35 dollars with tax! Great bargain. Yes they do take 3 batteries which do NOT come with them, but I buy batteries bulk anyway as so much uses batteries. One on my little table beside my chair and I was able to read in comfort. I put one in my bathroom, with the top pushed down so it wasn't full bright, and one on top of my fridge again with top pushed down a little. My place was very comfortable. I did not have to carry one with me at anytime. I will be ordering at least one more package of these to have just in case a long power outage happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have got a few and some for presents as they are a very good idea

reviews.reviewTitle: petites lanternes pour dépanner lors de pannes d'électricité
reviews.reviewText: Comme nous aurons sûrement du verglas encore cette année, ce qui entraîne souvent des pannes d'électricité plus ou moins longues, je suis bien contente d'avoir ces petites lanternes que je trouve géniales: légères, très lumineuses, compactes et qui s'ouvrent très facilement. Merci !
